title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Action Research for Enhancing Generative AI and Critical Questioning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language comprehension skills at the middle school level
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Apply five or more critical questioning strategies to evaluate the reliability of text generated by generative AI
Demonstrate methods for analyzing bias, accuracy, and context of AI-generated content through practical assignments
Reflectively improve critical questioning abilities through peer and self-assessment in LMS chat logs and discussion forums
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
